/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the vibrancy and energy of the city.
